description: Made from 6.3 oz. cotton sateen. Early 1950s–inspired details. Reinforced with double-needle stitching at the seams. Fitted through the chest and waist. Chain-stitched embroidery at the back.
fitting_details: Fitted through the chest and waist.
Size medium has a 25" front body length, a 24" back body length, an 18.75" shoulder, a 42.5" chest, and a 34.75" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
"Double RL Company Rodeo Academy," a horseshoe, and "RRL" embroidered at the back.
Adjustable buttoned tabs at the back waist.
